texts.text: Chainlink’s partnership with SWIFT could revolutionize blockchain-based financial messaging.
Concerns raised about centralization in oracle node operators for Chainlink.
Chainlink staking V2 successfully launched, receiving positive community feedback.
Smart contracts using Chainlink feeds are failing in certain low-liquidity markets.
LINK token sees 18% weekly gain amid integration news with major DEX.
Ethereum developers confirmed Dencun upgrade to roll out in Q3 with EIP-4844 included.
Gas fees spike to 200+ Gwei during airdrop frenzy, leading to network congestion.
Vitalik emphasizes ZK-Rollups and account abstraction as Ethereum’s scaling path.
Massive sell-off of ETH by early whales observed ahead of ETF ruling.
Layer 2 adoption surpasses mainnet volume for the first time.
Tether prints $1B more USDT on Tron, triggering speculation about reserve quality.
CEO of Tether claims full backing by US treasury bills and commercial paper.
USDT remains stable in deep liquidity pools, showing market trust despite skepticism.
Auditors find inconsistencies in some of Tether’s past reserve attestations.
USDT is now accepted in over 20 countries as cross-border payment tool.
Bitcoin hash rate hits new all-time high after China miners rejoin network.
BTC ETF approval expected this quarter, driving institutional inflows.
Bitcoin dominance drops to 38% as altcoins outperform post-halving.
Whale moves 15,000 BTC to Binance; community expects dump.
El Salvador continues monthly BTC purchases, now holds over 10,000 coins.
Solana network faced a 4-hour outage due to validator desyncing.
Despite outage, Solana NFT volume surpasses Ethereum in 24h window.
Jito and Helius validators push for next-gen MEV-resistant consensus.
FTX estate sells remaining SOL, concludes bankruptcy asset liquidation.
USDC and USDT on Solana resume after Circle reaffirms support.
Arbitrum DAO votes to allocate $215M in grants to ecosystem devs.
Sudden drop in ARB price triggers liquidation cascade on Aave.
TVL on Arbitrum crosses $12B amid GameFi and DeFi explosion.
ARB token unlock adds 300M new tokens to supply, stirs sell pressure.
Reddit devs launch social login dApp on Arbitrum, gaining traction.
MakerDAO rolls out SubDAO structure and tokenomics overhaul.
MKR spikes 28% on whale accumulation and token buybacks.
Concern grows around centralization of governance votes.
Maker’s RWAs generate over $2M in monthly yield.
DAI briefly depegs to $0.97 after curve pool imbalance.
Avalanche’s Avalanche Warp Messaging launches cross-chain messaging layer.
TVL on Avalanche ecosystem up 18% over past 30 days.
Gaming on AVAX booms as Shrapnel beta gains traction.
AVAX whales shift $20M to exchanges after token unlock.
Validators raise concerns over rising hardware requirements.
Optimism’s Superchain vision expands with three new L2 integrations.
OP token sees 12% drop after scheduled unlock of 100M tokens.
New dev toolchain launched by OP Labs to simplify L2 onboarding.
ETH bridging to Optimism increases 3x week-over-week.
Critics argue governance is dominated by a few multisigs.
Aave V4 upgrade includes isolated lending markets and GHO stability tweaks.
Large liquidation of ARB collateral on Aave raises systemic risk questions.
Aave governance passes vote to increase ETH collateral ratio.
GHO stablecoin peg volatility causes ripple effects in Curve pools.
Aave Labs proposes RWA module to integrate tokenized treasuries.
